body_content.explanation: a choice that you make about something after thinking about several possibilities:
examples: She has had to make some very difficult decisions.
The company will reach/come to/make a decision shortly.
Let me have a/your decision (= tell me what you have decided) by next week.
It was his decision to leave.
The decision about/on whether he is innocent or guilty rests with the jury.
We need to take a lot of factors into account in our decision-making.
I accepted his decision that he wished to die with dignity.

body_content.explanation: the ability to decide quickly and without pausing because you are not certain:
examples: She acted with decision, closing the bank account and calling the police.
